column5: ....will keep the fishing junky from his appointed task. It was wet, windy ,and not nice, but I was not staying indoors.  Off to the stagnating town of Welland in search of perchies. Took a while, but found the perch and gills all schooled together in a feeding frenzy. Guess the weather front turned on the appetite. Kept me a decent number for dinner.    As usual, a lot of fun. Also indulged in another one of my bad habits; going for a flying leap  Ground sure was hard this time.
Can I catch them from a tree stand Bruce? Hope yer feeling better.  Nice haul.
Kiitokset! dere, BigUgli, for the report.  Roly poly fish heads fer sure.
nice one big guy!  sorry to hear you took a tumble, i nearly ended up in the lake today too, Sorel boots not too good on bare rock i guess.
I'm kinda used to falling.   It's the landing part that I just can't get used to
Good going Bruce That'll be great in the frying pan!!!  Hope your not to sore from the flying leap you got yourself in. Thanks for sharing Jacques
